property.name: displayVariant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: ideasTitle
property.label: Title Text Singular
property.description: Title Text Single will display when there is only 1 record

property.name: pluralTitle
property.label: Title Text Plural
property.description: Title Text Plural will display when there are 0 or more than 1 records

property.name: showNumberOfIdeas
property.label: Display Number of Ideas
property.description: Show/hide number of Ideas with directory title. Number will not display if the title is hidden.

property.name: createIdeasURL
property.label: Ideas Create Edit Page API Name
property.description: Enter the API name for the Idea Create Edit page. API name can be found in page properties and shall include '__c'.

property.name: showBottomBorder
property.label: Show Bottom Border
property.description: Display a border line below the header

property.name: listId
property.label: List Id
property.description: Unique ID for the list results. Allows multiple list components to exist on a page. This property relates the filter component to a specific list.
